# get csv input file

inFile <- input$file1
data <- inFile$datapath

# render table only if it is dogs

shiny::renderTable({
  # check that it is the dog file, not cats or rabbits
  shiny::validate(
    need("Dog Name" %in% colnames(data)),
    "Dog Name column not found - did you load the right file?"
  )

  data
})
